    java.util.List<Researcher> Publication.getAuthor()

    Returns a List of Researcher objects
    java.util.List<Researcher> ResearchGroup.getResearcherList()

    This method adds a Researcher to the researcherList
    int Researcher.compareTo​(Researcher res)
    This method orders Researcher that are in a List of Researchers, by their types, in alphabetical order.
    java.util.List<Publication> CISUC.getPublicationsResearcher​(Researcher res)
    This method returns a list with all the publications of a researcher.
    void Student.setGuidingResearcher​(Researcher guidingResearcher)
    Alters the Researcher whose job is to guide the Student
